QuestData.Title: Get Our Stuff Back!
QuestData.Description: Our bombs and tools! Those sneaky monkeys to the east stole them all in the dead of night!$B$BCan you go out there and get them back for us, $n? Without those tools, we have absolutely no way to get off of this island!
QuestData.RewardText: <Sassy breathes a sigh of relief when she sees all of the tools and bombs that you recovered.>$B$BI thought we were doomed for sure. But now we can start working on a way to get off of this island!
